testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Sam Garcia must be one of the most brilliant budding developers I've ever met! It would not be surprising if he would be hired by a large company soon. Hey you! Hire this guy! I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
